required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Maveric Magnetic Resonance Imaging Used to Study Detailed Bone Apposition and Fixation of the Stryker Trident II Tritanium System
clinical_study.official_title: Maveric Magnetic Resonance Imaging Used to Study Detailed Bone Apposition and Fixation of the Stryker Trident II Tritanium System

lead_sponsor.agency: Hospital for Special Surgery, New York

clinical_study.source: Hospital for Special Surgery, New York

brief_summary.textblock: The study aims to describe bone apposition and fixation of the Trident and Trident II Tritatnium acetabular system in patients 1 year status post total hip replacement. We will be studying this by comparing magnetic resonance imaging (MRI)s taken 1 year s/p total hip replacement with a Trident II cup with MRI's taken of patients with the Trident Cup who had MRIs done at 1 year post-op.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: 1 control group who have had been implanted with a Trident cup and have already had MRIs taken at their one year post-operative visit. This group's MRI's will be compared with MRI's from Tridend II patients who have had MRI's at 1 year post-operative visit.

primary_outcome.measure: Comparison of bone apposition and fixation in patients with the Trident II Tritanium hip system with bone apposition and fixation in patients with Trident cups.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients who have undergone THR with Trident Cup
arm_group.description: Patients who have had THR with Trident Cups and have previously had an MRI taken at the Hospital for Special Surgery at 1 year post-op.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients who have undergone THR with Trident II Cup
arm_group.description: Patients who have had THR with Trident II Cups and will have an MRI taken at their one year post-operative visit.

intervention.description: Patients who are part of "Arm 2" will undergo an MRI at their 1 year post-operative visit.
intervention.arm_group_label: Patients who have undergone THR with Trident II Cup

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Patients who had a primary total hip replacement with a Stryker Trident II acetabular cup that have one year or more follow up.
2. Patients that are willing able able to have an MRI at their one year follow up visit.
3. Patients entered into the CORRe database (our HSS institutional joint replacement registry).
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Patients who have not been consented as part of the CORRe database.
2. Patients who are unable or refuse to have an MRI at their 1 year follow up.
